title: Fortis
description: Who knew that Nephilims and Fallen Angels were real?Life as I knew it was unbelievably normal. Until it wasn’t. I had been accepted to the college of my dreams— UCLA. And I’d even met the perfect boy. Not that I was the boy-crazy type... that was my sister. Something about him was different, the attraction was undeniable.All it took was one harrowing night for everything to change; all my plans and dreams came crashing down. When the dust cleared, I found myself the center of a world where Nephilim and Fallen Angels existed! They had been hiding in plain sight, right here in Los Angeles. Now, I couldn’t believe my new normal, instead of dorms and classes, I had to make life and death decisions. I was torn between both worlds, because both sides wanted me—they claimed that I was the key to winning this war.But my life wasn’t just about me, and I’d be damned if I’d allow my sister to be dragged into this crazy world. She deserved a life as far away as possible from danger... a danger that started from the moment I met Alec.
author: P.C. Benson
